info.name: Aero Theme for Firefox 3.5
info.description:
Required:
- All-Glass Firefox 2.1.2 for Firefox 3.5 Final( http://www.neowin.net/forum/index.php?showtopic=746714 )

Suggested:
- Compact Menu ( https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/4550 )

Note:
Aero looks quite bad maximized on Vista(fixed in Win7), install vistaglazz to make it look good. ( http://www.codegazer.com/vistaglazz/ )

Feedback is always welcome.
